Grouped_Utterances: I’ve been okay, working on the meditation and the letter for my brother.   I wrote it, but I haven’t sent it yet.   It felt good, but I’m nervous about sending it.   I’m worried he won’t respond, and that will hurt.   I think I’d feel sad but also relieved that I reached out.
It’s been okay, but I feel a bit distant from them lately.   Not really. I’ve been more focused on my own stuff.
I think I’m feeling a bit more at peace.   It feels freeing. I love being outdoors.
I’ve been doing it most nights, and it’s really helped with my sleep.
I’ve been going out for bike rides more often.

That’s a healthy perspective. It’s about expressing your care, regardless of the outcome. Would you like to set a goal for when you might send it?   Maybe by the end of this week?   That sounds like a fun idea! It could be a great way to explore new areas. Would you like to set a goal to try kayaking sometime?   Yes, I think I’ll look into it for next month.   Maybe I could invite them for a bike ride.
